# Match-3 Game Instructions

This project is a Match-3 game using Vite, TypeScript, and HTML5 Canvas.

## Project Structure
- `src/game/`: Contains all game logic.
- `src/game/Board.ts`: Grid logic.
- `src/game/Game.ts`: Main game loop.
- `src/game/LevelManager.ts`: Level configuration (30 levels).
- `src/game/Renderer.ts`: Canvas drawing.

## Development
- Run `npm run dev` to start the server.
- Run `npm run build` to build for production.
